questStart: Can you help find 2 of them?

questStart: Can you help me find 4 tiny frogs?
I want to learn about how they hop!
questInProgress: Have you seen any jumping frogs?

questFinished: Wow! Thank you! Now I can watch these cute frogs jump!
hints: Search for tiny green creatures that hop in the grass!
